name: Operation A-Bis
description:
Operation A-Bis is an exploration game where the player take on the role of a lost scientist in the abyss of Mariana Trench.

A french operation: the Operation A, was sent in the deep to prove there are no monsters. After an accident, your are the only survivor, trapped in your damaged submarine.

Explore

You will have at your disposal a set of tools to help you explore the abyss:
-Radar
-Ballast
-Map
-And more...

Discover

Find black box and listen old Operation A's records, discover the past and touch the secret of the: Operation A-Bis...

Repair

Take care of your submarine. Avoid shocks and other danger of the deep to not sink in the abyss and never come back. 

Analyze errors and fix it. Upgrade your submarine to explore more.

Project made for school project.

  • Left click: Select / Take objects
  • Right click: Quit
  • ECHAP: Open Menu
